title: The "Chandrika" Diamond and Pearl Choker: A Legacy of Hyderabad
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: Features a central square pendant meticulously crafted with intricate floral motifs and encrusted with uncut Polki diamonds in a closed setting (Kundan Style). The pearls are strung in multiple strands (Gundu Mala style) to create a regal and elegant choker. Classic Hyderabadi design reflects the region's rich heritage.
colors: Predominantly gold and white with a subtle ivory hue from the pearls. The diamonds add a brilliant sparkle.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also a beautiful statement piece for formal events.
description: A timeless piece that blends tradition with elegance. The craftsmanship is impeccable, showcasing the skill of our Hyderabad artisans. The uncut diamonds offer a unique brilliance, and the natural pearls are of the highest quality, promising lasting beauty and value. The 'Chandrika' is not just jewelry; it's an investment and an heirloom to be cherished for generations.
